title: Calories in 1 Teaspoon Brown Sugar
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 teaspoon brown sugar, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Packed light brown sugar; 1 level teaspoon ≈4 g; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, packing density, moisture, and type (light vs. dark). Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 1 teaspoon of brown sugar contains about 16 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 teaspoon brown sugar?
Is brown sugar healthier than white?
faqs.a: Similar calories; brown has trace minerals from molasses but still mostly sugar.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in 1 tsp brown sugar?
faqs.a: About 4.2 g of sugars, nearly all carbs.

faqs.q: Does packing affect calories in brown sugar?
faqs.a: Yes; packed is denser (≈4 g, 16 kcal) vs. loose (≈3 g, 12 kcal).

faqs.q: Any protein or fat in brown sugar?
faqs.a: Negligible—0 g protein and 0 g fat per teaspoon.
